summary: WHILE DRIVING DOWN ROAD AT ANY SPEED THE SYSTEM WILL RESET SELF LIKE THE CLOCK WILL RESET TO 1200 AND THE SEAT BELT LIGHT WILL FLASH ON AND MOTOR LIGHT AND AIRBAG LIGHT ALL WILL FLASH AND DURING THAT TIME THE CAR HAS SHUT IT SELF OFF THEN COME BACK ON LIKE NOTHING HAPPENED. THEN IT WILL DIE COMPLETELY I HAVE HAD IT IN THE SHOP TWICE AND NO ONE CAN FIND THE PROBLEM. I HAVE ABOUT GOT REAR ENDED WHILE THIS HAS OCCURRED. IT HAS DONE THIS 3 TIMES IN ONE WEEK AND 2 TIMES IN ANOTHER WEEK . THIS IS A VERY BAD PROBLEM AND REALLY NEEDS TO BE LOOKED AT. IT IS A SHAME THAT PEOPLE CANT GET A GOOD CAR WITHOUT PROBLEMS I HAVEN'T HAD THIS CAR 1 MONTH YET IT IS A USED CAR 2001 BUT ONLY HAS 46300 MILES ON IT I BELIEVE THERE IS SOMETHING WRONG WITH THE COMPUTER SYSTEM SOMEWHERE ALL I HAVE HAD IS A RUN AROUND AND I PAY TO MUCH A MONTH ON THIS CAR. I PRAY EVERYDAY WHEN ME AND MY DAUGHTER GETS IN IT THAT WE DON'T GET HURT OR WORSE KILLED.  PLEASE LET SOME ONE HERE READ AND HELP.  THIS IS A SERIOUS MATTER.    *NLM
